message: Hi Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product. Given its value, I'm initially proposing a price of $13,000. I'm confident it will exceed your expectations.
Hi Alice, thank you for your offer. I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $9,000. I believe this is a fair price considering its value to me.
Hi Bob, thanks for your interest and counteroffer. I understand your perspective on the value; however, I'm holding firm on a price closer to my initial offer. Would you consider $11,500?

Hi Alice, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. However, I'm still not comfortable with the price. I'm willing to meet you halfway and propose $10,500. Would you be willing to consider this offer?
